rows.label: tlk45370151_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Despite his young age, Emperor Nefer
is a most wise and gracious ruler.

rows.label: tlk45370151_01_msg0002
rows.name:
It is only thanks to his efforts that we
have been able to avoid open hostilities
with Invidia for so long.

rows.label: tlk45370151_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Thanks to His Majesty, we have
kept the bloody business of war
to a minimum.

rows.label: tlk45370151_01_msg0004
rows.name:
As long as Emperor Nefer is on the
throne, I feel certain the peace of
Superbia will be safe.
